title: Tempura vegetables with yuzu dressing
description: The juice of the Japanese citrus fruit yuzu adds zing to the mayo-style dressing served here. A neat talking point as you hand round crunchy deep-fried vegetables with a delightful dip at your party.Equipment and preparation: you will need a deep-fat fryer for this recipe.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz purple sprouting broccoli, cut into florets
1 red onion, peeled and cut into petals
1 carrot, cut into chunks and blanched
500ml/18fl oz rapeseed or light olive oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
